resources.string: You are currently not using a WiFi connection. When downloading using a cellular connection high costs may be charged by your provider.\n\nDo you really want to download this file using a cellular connection?

This application was developed to support people watching their favorite movies from the ZDF Mediathek while they have no internet access. It was NOT developed to download copy protected material and it is not intended to do so.

The content is provided by a third-party and you have to fulfill their license to be allowed to download their content.

If you agree to use this app without trying to violate someone's rights you are free to use it, otherwise go back to the Google Play Store and uninstall this app.
There was a request time out while fetching information from the content provider. Most of the time it will work if you go back and try it again.

Sorry, but it seems that there is a bug in the application which caused it to crash right now. Please help me fix this bug as soon as possible by sending me a crash report which (hopefully) helps me to locate the bug.\n\nWould you like to send me a bug report (via email)?
